calculateisolines.name: CalculateIsolines
calculateisolines.description: Grants permission to determine destinations or service areas reachable within a specified time

calculateroutematrix.name: CalculateRouteMatrix
calculateroutematrix.description: Grants permission to calculate routing matrice which providing travel time and distances between sets of origins and destinations

calculateroutes.name: CalculateRoutes
calculateroutes.description: Grants permission to calculates routes between two or more locations

optimizewaypoints.name: OptimizeWaypoints
optimizewaypoints.description: Grants permission to calculate the most efficient sequence for visiting multiple waypoints or locations along a route

snaptoroads.name: SnapToRoads
snaptoroads.description: Grants permission to enhances the accuracy of geographic positioning by aligning GPS coordinates to the nearest road segments on a digital map
